definition: (physics) equipotential
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)

sentences.english: Biallelic inactivation of the NF2 gene was detected in 36% of meningiomas.
sentences.chinese: NF2雙等位基因鈍化可在36%的腦膜瘤中檢測到。

sentences.english: ApoE genotypes and alleles frequencies were compared among three groups.
sentences.chinese: 比較各組基因型及等位基因頻率分佈。

sentences.english: The surface itself is an equipotential.
Now the variant of each gene is called an allele .
sentences.chinese: 每一種基因的變化就叫做等位基因。

sentences.english: Then, isopotential and electric field intensity lines are plotted.
sentences.chinese: 由此，繪製了整個場域的等位線和電場強度矢量分佈。

sentences.english: The colloquial usage of the term gene often refers to the scientific concept of an allele.
sentences.chinese: 口語用法基因通常指的是科學發展觀的一個等位基因。

sentences.english: When the two alleles are not identical, they are said to be heterozygous.
sentences.chinese: 當兩個等位基因不同時，稱之爲雜合性的。

sentences.english: Aelle frequency proved particular loci have relation with geographical location.
sentences.chinese: 等位基因頻率說明了特異性位點與地理位置有關。

sentences.english: The report is about equipotential surface.
sentences.chinese: 那份報導是有關於等位面的。

sentences.english: Alle I wonder about your skin tone and shape of your nose ?
sentences.chinese: 等位基因我不知道你的肌膚色調和形狀，你的鼻子？

sentences.english: The allele for blue eyes is recessive.
sentences.chinese: 蘭色眼睛的等位基因是隱性的。

sentences.english: ApoE genotypes and alleles frequencies were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比較兩組基因型及等位基因頻率分佈。

sentences.english: Alleles C of position -69 possibly play a role in preventing tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 等位基因C可能有阻止結核桿菌感染的作用。

sentences.english: The allele for blue eyes is recessive.
sentences.chinese: 藍色眼睛的等位基因是隱性的。

sentences.english: In genetics, refers to an allele that is expressed in both the heterozygous and homozygous condition.
sentences.chinese: 指等位基因在雜合狀態和純合狀態都有表達的現象。

sentences.english: The distributions of equipotential surface in electrostatic deflection system under different cases are given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了不同情況下靜電偏轉系統中的等位面分布。

definition: to sit at a table with others with whom one is unacquainted
to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
table turnover rate (in a restaurant)
to form a long queue (idiom)/(of cars) to be bumper to bumper
buffet/self-service meal
to line up
Japanese cuisine (abbr. for 日本料理[Ri4 ben3 liao4 li3])
booth (in restaurants etc) (loanword from "car seat")
rice with meat and vegetables
charity performance (theater in former times)
morning tea
stall (of market etc)
food/dish/meal
siu mei/spit-roasted meat dish in Cantonese cuisine
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
set meal (esp. in a Japanese restaurant)
